title: Jenna Dewan’s boyfriend Steve Kazee thinks pregnancy is ‘mind-blowing’
text:
Jenna Dewan’s boyfriend Steve Kazee thinks her pregnancy is ‘mind-blowing’ (Picture: Instagram)

Jenna Dewan’s boyfriend Steve Kazee has opened up about her pregnancy and he thinks the whole thing is basically ‘mind-blowing’.

Steve and Jenna have been dating for over a year now and recently revealed they are expecting their first child together.

Jenna is already mum to six-year-old daughter Everly, who she shares with Channing Tatum, and she’s been keeping fans updated with her second pregnancy while debuting her baby bump on social media.

As for her baby daddy, he’s still trying to get his head around the whole thing.

Speaking to Entertainment Tonight, Steve said: ‘It’s mind-blowing, the whole thing. Watching a child grow inside of a human has been the most amazing experience so far.’

The couple are expecting their first baby together (Picture: Instagram)

‘I’m trying to stay calm,’ he joked. ‘Not panic and let it all happen.’

Steve revealed that he is planning on taking the next year off, so he can be there for Jenna and their newborn when they finally arrive.

‘I don’t want to miss any of the baby growing. I don’t want to miss any of the morning sickness. I want to be there for all of it,’ he insisted.

Jenna, meanwhile, has said that becoming a mother is the ‘best most incredible thing that has ever happened’ to her.

Jenna shares six-year-old daughter Everly with ex Channing Tatum (Picture: Instagram)

In a sweet Instagram post, she wrote: ‘@stevekazee you are a gift from above and i couldn’t be more excited to be expanding our family together…! Thank you guys for all the love!!’

Jenna and Steve first went public with their relationship in October 2018 – six months after she confirmed her split from her Step Up co-star Channing after nine years of marriage.

It’s reported that Jenna had told Channing about her pregnancy and he has been ‘very supportive’ of the news.

‘Jenna told Channing that she was pregnant and wanted to make sure he knew before she announced it,’ an insider claimed to E! News. ‘He is happy for her and was very supportive.’

Channing, meanwhile, is dating singer Jessie J.
